comments_since_last_sample.body: They should include which level of zoom they are using to detect these differences.
I think this game looks amazing,
Xbox one x resolution n performance ?
Was gonna get this on PS5 but I guess I should just get this on PC huh.
1080P 60 on ps5 and xsx? Come on now if Spider-Man can run at 1440p 60 with RT on being an open world game so can this.
I can't help but feel maybe TAA has overdone it blurring on the performance mode. I hope devs find an alternative soon.
The 60fps dips at times I’ve noticed also there are various bugs that definitely need to be addressed one being the most annoying involving the huddle
